tool_description: This api will encrypt given the text using aes 256 cbc algorithm
name: Encryption API
title: Encryption API

api_list.name: Encryption
api_list.description: This api will encrypt the given text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://encryption-api2.p.rapidapi.com/enc.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "encryption-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
